quest.name: From Darts till Dawn
journal:
 Quest Sync
The bleary-eyed guard appears to be suffering from a lack of sleep.
objectives: Use the blowgun to shoot ghilman from the designated location.

dialogue.name: GUARD03368
dialogue.text: You're one of Alisaie's friends, aren't you? I hear you lot have a knack for putting down troublesome beasts.

dialogue.name: GUARD03368
dialogue.text: I'm not sure if that includes the supernatural, but walking corses known as ghilman have been running amok outside of the south entrance. They grab anyone who wanders too close, and drag them under the sand.

dialogue.name: GUARD03368
dialogue.text: I almost fell victim to them myself, and I was lucky to escape. Thing is, I dropped my mother's pendant as I fled, and I'll do anything to get it back. She was a patient here, you see, and it's all I have to remember her by.

dialogue.name: GUARD03368
dialogue.text: Luckily, we've found that enchanted darts shot from a blowgun send the ghilman back to whichever hell they crawled from.

dialogue.name: GUARD03368
dialogue.text: My plan is to rush in and grab the pendant, while you shoot those undead bastards from a distance. So, will you help me?

dialogue.name: GUARD03368
dialogue.text: I knew you would! Come on, let's get this over with.

dialogue.name: GUARD03368
dialogue.text: I'm fairly certain I dropped the pendant by those ruins over there. As soon as I've found it, I'll race back to the inn. In the meantime, I'll need you to keep the ghilman off my back. Here goes nothing!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: If any ghilman appear, shoot them with the enchanted darts. You may move the camera, as well as zoom in and out. Target the ghilman and use the blowgun with [???] / [???].

dialogue.name: GUARD03368
dialogue.text: Ha ha! They didn't like that very much, did they? And best of all, I got the pendant!

dialogue.name: GUARD03368
dialogue.text: Do you know, I've never seen such fine aim with a blowgun. The secret, though, lies in the darts. They were excavated from the ruins of Nabaath Areng.

dialogue.name: GUARD03368
dialogue.text: According to the historians, these same darts were used by the Nabaath to destroy ghilman all those years ago. There were whole stockpiles of the things, in fact.

dialogue.name: GUARD03368
dialogue.text: Anyway, that's enough about ancient history for one day. More importantly, I'd like to thank you for all you've done! Please accept this as thanks and give Alisaie my regards.
